maple: F:= proc(d) local r,Q; uses numtheory;
mathematica: PellSolve[(m_Integer)?Positive] := Module[{cf, n, s}, cf = ContinuedFraction[Sqrt[m]]; n = Length[Last[cf]]; If[n == 0, Return[{}]]; If[OddQ[n], n = 2n]; s = FromContinuedFraction[ContinuedFraction[Sqrt[m], n]]; {Numerator[s], Denominator[s]}];
A033317 = DeleteCases[PellSolve /@ Range[100], {}][[All, 2]] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Nov 21 2020, after _N. J. A. Sloane_ in A002349 *)
